name: Smarty Mouse
description:
Altogether 32 levels of adventure for our smarty mouse to try to escape the chase of the fat cat to get its favorite cheese in kitchen! If our mouse is not smarty enough to go through the rotating obstacles without hitting any of them, it'll be caught by the angry lady, so, be careful, brave, fasty, and above all, smarty!

Smarty Mouse - Fascinating visual, fabulous music and in-depth riveting game-play! It's free only for a couple of days, so grab it when you can!
